text: Dakota Johnson just completed her final turn as Anastasia Steele in the incredibly erotic / hilarious Fifty Shades Freed â€” a film that saw Ana and Christian take a break from the ` ` Red Room'' to get married, get pregnant, and deal with a sinister former publisher named Hyde who's hell bent on killing everyone whilst being incredibly extra. ` ` It's sometimes necessary to have a shot of something strong beforehand.''
